segments.text: Hello Gina ! We've spoken so many times on the phone but's it's so good to finally meet you in person !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello sir . Good to meet you , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , please don't call me sir . Just call me Jason .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , Jason . So how was the flight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Pretty good . There was a bit of turbulence while we were over the Pacific Ocean but it wasn't too bad . The worst thing was the guy behind me . He snored all through the night !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? But you were in first class ! Nobody woke that guy up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The stewardess said it's not company policy to wake people up for any reason .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's terrible ! So you didn't get any sleep ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not much ... but that's ok ... I'm a night owl anyway .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , aside from visiting our factory and offices , are there any other things you want to accomplish while you're in China ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd love to squeeze in a trip to the Great Wall .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's not a problem . We can have a company car take you there . It's only about a two hour drive .
segments.speaker: S2
